item.title: Travis + PyInstaller + GitHub Releases
item.description: Part of one of the projects I’ve been working on in my day job recently has involved taking over the development of a tool that implements some simple data anonymisation. This includes the deployment of an executable that can be used by non-technical staff, who will likely be the main users of the tool. It’s also highly likely that all of those staff will be working on Windows PCs. As the executable is created through PyInstaller, this means the executable needs to be built in a Windows environment.
